name: DD Pixel Slide
description:
DD Pixel Slide is a unique Hyper-Casual Puzzle game. The idea of this game is taken from Rubik’s Cube.

In this game, you should move the cells to make the exact given pattern. Then you will pass the level. But in harder levels you should move cells more carefully! So, be creative! 

Check out our website: https://doondook.studio/

Quick Access to more games: https://doondook.studio/buy-html5-games
